cell-methods: Error: area: mean where sea depth: sum where sea (over entire ocean column) time: mean not found in cell methods, please register
description: Vertically integrated total primary (organic carbon) production by phytoplankton.  This should equal the sum of intpdiat+intpphymisc, but those individual components may be unavailable in some models.
ui-label: Primary Organic Carbon Production by All Types of Phytoplankton
